title: Client Crashing
body:
Every single time I play a game, my client will crash up to 5 times (that's the most so far) 
My Desktop PC is a ROG, that has more then viable stats to be able to smoothly run this game on the highest setting, and yet this problem still continues to happen, I've tried lowering the settings just to make sure my graphics card wasn't having troubles keeping up, I've also reinstalled the game and still nothing.
Just curious how my old laptop was able to run league perfectly, but after a few updates of your client a computer that is 10x better isn't able to run it without a game crashing?
Is there something I'm missing here?

replies.body: No, I don't run anything like that, I have no programs that affect league in any way.

I lie, sorry. 
I have curse voice.
Has disabling this resolved your issue? Please remember to test in a custom game so you do not receive any form of leaver punishment.
I haven't had Curse running for the past couple games, and I haven't noticed a change in the amount of time the clients crashes.
Could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6), let me know if this helps at all.

I actually had an issue after the last client update, which left my client only Opening up to a blank black screen with a small box saying "Don't show these tips again" After that incident I asked members of league to help and they told me to repair my client, so I did, do you think repairing it a second time will change anything?

Hey there,

Are you currently running lolreplay or any other recorder software/Anything that interfaces with the game, if so I suggest you disable these as they may be the cause of your crashing issues.

If this is not the case, please let me know and we can run through some more potential solutions.
